General.Name: European Wax Center Inc
General.Description: European Wax Center, Inc. operates as the franchisor and operator of out-of-home waxing services in the United States. It offers body and facial waxing services; and pre- and post-service products, including ingrown hair serums, exfoliating gels, brow shapers, and skin treatments. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Plano, Texas.
General.Address: 5830 Granite Parkway, Plano, TX, United States, 75024
